Class PredicatedAveraging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.util.rangeoperation.core.DefaultRangeOperation<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RangeOperation<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    @Beta
public class PredicatedAveraging
extends DefaultRangeOperation<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    An averaging operation over a range, valid over numbers or arbitrarily nested lists of numbers, ignoring items not satisfying a given predicate.
